trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were 2 other sightings in San Antonio on or around February 9th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi had just clocked out of work at citi bank on hwy 211 and potranco when i start walking towards my car i notices a bright orange red light (like when your getting a muffler welded you see that bright blue light it was exactly like that but red\orange\and a slight violet and a bright brown) it was eastbound by 1604 and so i call my friend to tell ask her where shes at she said las palapas on 1604 and bandera hwy 151 i told her look up in the sky!! she said said what am i supposed to see??? i said you don't see it??? its a bright orange reddish light looks like an hid light from a bmw\mercedes... she said ur crazy and hung up so i get in my car and start driving down potranco towards 1604 and saw it was not 1 but 3!!!!! so i called her again and she confirmed it she saw it too!! this happened for a good 15 minutes and then they were gone! as i was driving i also saw about ten small lights flying over me like small stars but they only flashed white but not very bright. i think they were jets they were more man made looking compared to the 3 bigger brighter objects (ufo's) i hope im not the only one besides my friend that saw this.
